data_table.description: Specimen Draws - details regarding specimen collections. Note: The rel# in the file name is used by the submitter to track embargo releases. Files that have "rel2" or later may either contain additional variables or more recent data as compared to the previous rel#.

variable.name: DRAWDY
variable.comment: Number of days from randomization/enrollment to date of specimen draw.

variable.name: DRAWVY
variable.comment: Visit year for which this specimen was collected.

variable.name: DRAWTIME
variable.comment: Time specimen was drawn in military time. Format HH24:MI (e.g. 13:20).

variable.name: CFUGTIME
variable.comment: Time that centrifuging of specimen began in military time. Format HH24:MI (e.g. 13:20). Variable specific to only the WHI Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.

variable.name: VIALTIME
variable.comment: Time specimen placed into cryovials in military time. Format HH24:MI (e.g. 13:20). Variable specific to only the WHI Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.

variable.name: FREZTIME
variable.comment: Time cryovials placed in freezer in military time. Format HH24:MI (e.g. 13:20).

variable.name: FASTHRS
variable.comment: Number of hours since had anything to eat or drink besides water before specimen draw.

variable.name: VIGACT
variable.comment: Engaged in vigorous physical activity in last eight hours before specimen draw. Variable specific to only the WHI Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.

variable.name: ANTIINFL
variable.comment: Took aspirin or anti-inflammatory agents in last 48 hours before specimen draw. Variable specific to only the WHI Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.

variable.name: LIPEMIC
variable.comment: For HT and HT + DM screening visit and annual visits. Serum is lipemic. Variable specific to only the WHI Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.
